name: XAM
description:
An adventurer named Bob who wants to find an amulet that could bring luck. However when he found the amulet and used it, he had a blackout. The next thing he knew is that he appeared in a dungeon.

You can rub the amulet so that something good will happen. However, as you go deeper in this game, you would find that things are not that simple.

Control:

- A,D: Move left and right

- W: Jump

- R: Rub the amulet and bring luck

- J: Attack
